argument.description: An expression that returns a well-formed XML document with a data type of XML, CHAR, VARCHAR, CLOB, or BLOB.

description: Use XSLTRANSFORM to convert XML data into other formats, including the conversion of XML documents that conform to one XML schema into documents that conform to another schema.
